titles.title: Brand USA Extension Act
Brand USA Extension Act
A bill to extend the transfer of Electronic Travel Authorization System fees from the Travel Promotion Fund to the Corporation for Travel Promotion (Brand USA) through fiscal year 2027.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Brand USA Extension Act
This bill extends funding for Brand USA—the Corporation for Travel Promotion responsible for destination marketing for the United States—through FY2027.
